description: Aspect for defining an incident in context of Environmental and Social Standards as specified by the Catena-X Sustainability team.

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

IncidentCategoryCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining an incident category in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards).

IncidentSubcategories.description: Characteristic for defining subcategories of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards).
enum: Import and export of hazardous waste

Timestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

IncidentStatusCharacteristic.description: Incident status as defined in a list, default value = new

ThoroughfareTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a thoroughfare.

ThoroughfareEntity.description: Entity for a thoroughfare which consists of a type, value and number.

technicalKey.description: Technical key of a thoroughfare. As specified by BPDM, this can be a "STREET" or a different type.

value.description: Value of a thoroughfare, e.g. name of a street.

number.description: Number of a thoroughfare. As used differently in international context, this number can contain both numerical and alphanumerical values.

ThoroughfareCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a thoroughfare which can consist of a type (e.g. "STREET"), value (e.g. "Bernstra?e") and number (e.g. "45"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

LocalityTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a locality

LocalityEntity.description: Entity for a locality which consists of a key and a value.

value.description: Value of a locality, e.g. name of a city ("Mannheim").

LocalityCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a locality which belongs to an address and which consists of a type (e.g. "CITY") and value (e.g. "Mannheim"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

PremiseTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a premise.

PremiseEntity.description: Entity for a premise which consists of a type (technical key) and a value.

value.description: Value of a premise, e.g. name or designation of a particular site.

PremiseCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a premise which consists of a technical key (e.g. "BUILDING" or "OTHER") and a value (e.g. "Werk 1").

PostalDeliveryPointTechnicalKeyCharacter.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a postal delivery point.

PostalDeliveryPointEntity.description: Entity for a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key and a value.

technicalKey.description: Technical key of a postal delivery point.

value.description: Value of a postal delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate.

PostalDeliveryPointCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key (e.g. "MAILBOX" or "OTHER") and a value. Model follows the specification of BPDM.

CountryTrait.description: Regular expression for designation of a short name of a country as defined in ISO 3166-2.

shortName.description: The short variation of the name of the country.

CountryCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of a country belonging to an address

PostCodeTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for the technical key of a post code.

PostCodeEntity.description: Entity for a postcode which consists of a type plus a value.

value.description: The value of a post code.

technicalKey.description: The technical key of a post code.

PostCodeCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a postcode which can consist of a type (e.g. "REGULAR" for zip codes) and a value (e.g. "98765-4321"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

PostalAddress.description: A characteristic to express the postal address and which is intended to be referenced by other aspects.

premise.description: Premise of an address, e.g. a specific "BUILDING" but can also be used for naming a particular site.

postalDeliveryPoint.description: Delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate.

BpnlCharacteristic.description: BPNL (Business Partner Number Legal Entity) represents the legal entity of an organization (e.g. enterprise, university, association, â€¦) and contains its legal name (incl. legal form, if registered), registered address and tax number. The registered address is the official, legal correspondence address which has to be supplied to governmental and tax authorities and is the address which is used in any legal or court documents. BPNL is on corporate level and is unique for this legal entity.

BpnsCharacteristic.description: BPNS (Business Partner Number Site) represents a site which can be a production plant. A site can also be e.g. an office or a warehouse. An information related to a site is e.g. needed for reporting issues (How many sites does e.g. Beispiel AG have?), status of operation (out of operations due to environmental disaster), for certificates on site level (e.g. environment certificates) or for internal regulations on site level, (e.g. security topics, Corona rules,...). Several addresses (= BPNA with different streets and different gates) can belong to one site. A BPNS should be always linked to one BPNL via relationship 'belongs to legal entity'.

BpnaCharacteristic.description: BPNA (Business Partner Number Address) contains the legal name (incl. legal form, if registered) and additional organization information about site, e.g. Plant xxx, Branch office yyy of an organization with its corresponding, most commonly physical, address. A BPNA is always linked to a BPNL via relationship 'belongs to legal entity' and should be linked to a BPNS via relationship 'belongs to site'.The BPNA is on operational level (e.g. shipping or pick-up address).

LatitudeTrait.description: Regular expression for latitude information of geographic coordinates.

EssOriginatorCoordinatesEntity.description: Entity for geographic coordinates including a longitude and a latitude value.

EssOriginatorCoordinatesCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining geographic coordinates (longitude and latitude) of an incident originator in context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards).

ContactMailTrait.description: Regular expression for a contact mail address.

EssIncidentModeratorCharacteristic.description: Business Partner(s) who moderate(s) the clearing of an ESS incident

items.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

productCommodity.description: Free-text description for commodity of a product affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

productDescription.description: Description of product or component affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

rawMaterial.description: Raw material that causes an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

industry.description: Industry / Branch that causes the incident

incidentCategory.description: Environmental and social standards related incident category according to Supply Chain Due Diligence Act

incidentSubject.description: Title/ subject of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

incidentExternalSubject.description: Replaces Incident Subject for external communication

incidentDescription.description: Full text description of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

incidentAttachment.description: Picture(s) about the reported incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

systemDate.description: System created timestamp when the incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) was issued and saved

incidentDate.description: Date and time information when an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) occurred

incidentId.description: Unique identifier for an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

masterOpCoId.description: Incident ID that has been checked and validated. In case of duplicates the "parent" incident ID will be used as Master Operating Company Incident ID.

incidentDisplayId.description: Human readable format of Incident ID

incidentStatusInformation.description: Status of incident progress, default value = new

incidentShareFlag.description: Flag, that can be set to true in order to request to publish the incident, default value is false

subCaseOpCoIds.description: Incident Ids that belong to a Master Operating Company Incident Id

incidentSystemId.description: System Id that defines the tenant

essOriginatorCompanyName.description: Name of a company / an organisation that is the originator of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

essOriginatorBpnL.description: BPN-L ID of the company that causes the incident

essOriginatorBpnS.description: BPN-S ID of the company that causes the incident

essOriginatorBpnA.description: BPN-A ID of the company that causes the incident

essOriginatorCoordinates.description: Exact geographic position of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)

essIncidentIssuerFirstName.description: First name of ESS incident issuer

essIncidentIssuerEmailAddress.description: Email address of ESS incident issuer

essIncidentIssuerPhoneNo.description: Phone number of ESS incident issuer

flagAnonymous.description: Flag that Incident issuer wants to be anonymous

essIncidentIssuerId.description: System generated unique identifier of incident issuer

essIncidentIssuerAddress.description: Simple form of an address which can belong to a person, organisation, company etc.

essIncidentIssuerLastName.description: Last name of ESS incident Issuer

essOriginatorCountrySubdivision.description: Region within a country of ESS Originator

essIncidentIssuerCountrySubdivision.description: Region within a country of ESS Incident Issuer

essIncidentModerator.description: Business Partner who moderates the clearing of an ESS incident
